distances.secondary

Class LocalScalingCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • distances.primary.CombinedMetric
      • distances.secondary.LocalScalingCalculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class LocalScalingCalculator
extends CombinedMetric
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class implements a simple metric learning procedure for high-dimensional data that was proposed in a paper by Zelnik-Manor and Perona in 2005. It calculates local affinities, but these methods return the distance instead, as 1 - similarity, for consistency.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getTransformedDMatFromNSFPrimaryDMat

        public float[][] getTransformedDMatFromNSFPrimaryDMat()
        Transforms a primary into secondary distance matrix, based on kNN information. The new matrix is returned and the original is left intact.
        Returns:
        A secondary distance matrix, after local scaling.

      • dist

        public float dist(DataInstance firstInstance,
         DataInstance secondInstance,
         float[] distsFirst,
         float[] distsSecond)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculates the scaled distance.
        Parameters:
        firstInstance - First DataInstance.
        secondInstance - Second DataInstance.
        distsFirst - Distances from the first DataInstance to other points in the DataSet that the NeighborSetFinder object models.
        distsSecond - Distances from the second DataInstance to other points in the DataSet that the NeighborSetFinder object models.
        Returns:
        Float value that is the scaled distance between the points.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
